summary.para: Represents a RichEdit control which is a container for the rich-text document with all the necessary functionality for loading, editing and saving.
Initializes a new instance of the RichEditControl class.
Invokes the About dialog box.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraRichEdit.RichEditControl.ActiveView

summary.para: Gets the View currently used by the RichEdit control to show the document.

member.value: A class instance, which is one of the views listed in the enumeration.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraRichEdit.RichEditControl.ActiveViewType

summary.para: Gets or sets the type of the View which is currently used by the RichEdit to show the document.

member.value: A enumeration value specifying the active View type.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraRichEdit.RichEditControl.AddService(System.Type,System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceCreatorCallback,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Adds the specified service to the service container.

member.param: The type of service to add.
A callback object that is used to create the service. This allows a service to be declared as available, but delays the creation of the object until the service is requested.
true to promote this request to any parent service containers; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Adds the specified service to the service container.

A callback object that is used to create the service. This allows a service to be declared as available, but delays the creation of the object until the service is requested.

member.param: The type of service to add.
An instance of the service type to add. This object must implement or inherit from the type indicated by the serviceType parameter.
true to promote this request to any parent service containers; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Adds the specified service to the service container.

member.param: The type of service to add.
An instance of the service type to add. This object must implement or inherit from the type indicated by the serviceType parameter.

summary.para: Occurs before the RichEdit control is released from memory
Prevents the control from being updated until the method is called.
[To be supplied]
Unlocks the RichEdit control after a call to the method, and causes an immediate update without raising any notification events.
Occurs when the document content was changed.
[To be supplied]

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraRichEdit.RichEditControl.CurrentPageIndex

summary.para: Gets the index of a current page.

member.value: An integer, representing a zero-based page index.

summary.para: [To be supplied]
Occurs after a text document is loaded into the RichEdit control.
Occurs when a new document is created in the RichEdit Control.
Unlocks the control after a call to the method, and causes an immediate update.
Occurs when the search or search/replace operation in a document is complete.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraRichEdit.RichEditControl.GetService(System.Type)

summary.para: Gets the service object of the specified type.

member.param: An object that specifies the type of service object to get.
member.returns: A service object of the specified type,or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if there is no service object of this type.

summary.para: Removes the caret from the screen.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraRichEdit.RichEditControl.IsUpdateLocked

summary.para: Gets whether the scheduler control has been locked for updating.

member.value: true if the scheduler control is locked; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Invokes the "Open..." file dialog, creates a specific importer and loads the file.

summary.para: Occurs when the value of the property has changed.
